ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Nerf Protest.
ygData.msgSnippet: I think they ll see that we are whiners who are annoying them and they ll continue to ignore us.  Pestering gets you no where.  A well thought out letter
ygData.messageBody:
I think they'll see that we are whiners who are annoying them and
they'll continue to ignore us. Pestering gets you no where. A well
thought out letter developed by a group such as this forum can be much
more effective.

--- CatsEye543@... wrote:
> From: CatsEye543@...
>
> I agree, I think that we should all assemble on one
> day, in one area. Then we
> petition for a GM. While we wait, we send alot of
> FEEDBACK reports, asking
> Verant to finally balance the enchanter. When the GM
> comes, he/she will see
> that we are serious (hopefully). Tell me what you
> think.
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
